extendedInfo.description: Find my droid, your phoneâs bodyguardWhat if your phone got somehow lost?You know the threat when your phone falls into wrong hands.Wanna get it back with little effort?Wanna wipe out private data in it? We could make it real!Find your phone, protect privacy!With Find My Droid, dual insurance is right for you--Web available in most occasions, affiliated with SMS in case! This makes Find My Droid the best trust-worthy choice!Find My Droid is your phoneâs bodyguard app designed to restrict permission of accessing your phone, trace its location and protect privacy in it.Find My Droid restricts the phoneâs access permission by locking the device with your account. Only a SMS or simple clips on web page could make it.Find My Droid can trace and get the lost phone back by remotely locating the device on the map or setting alert through the web or SMS. With Find My Droid, no one could really take your device away. Itâs the best choice for phone lovers; meanwhile, you can set all the values as you like, and get the supreme ownership of your phone! No matter what the situation is, no matter who you are, Find My Droid can always be your phoneâs bodyguard! Just have a try, youâll find it trustworthy! Itâs free!5 preset manipulation functions and the security problem will go away.* Locate: it remotely locates the device on the map through the web or SMS, and the GPS is required to be on. The entire situation could be under control.* Alert: it enables you to remote alert through the web or SMS, if you are near your device. Its sharp and clear sound will definitely show you the way.* Lock: it remotely locks the device through web or SMS, preventing all the usages of the phone except for emergency calls. This clearly shows your supreme authority over the phone.* Wipe: it allows you to remotely delete all the data on the device through web or SMS, if it has been lost permanently. No one else can peep at your privacy. * SIM Alert: once your device is lost and the SIM card is changed, an alert SMS will be sent to the Emergency Number. HIGHLIGHTS:- TRUSTWORTHY* Dual insurance by web or SMS for you* Locate, lock and alert will help you find your phone* Wipe data and keep others away from your privacy items.- SIMPLE MANIPULATION * Only several simple taps can make it work* Remote controls need nothing but an account- CONSIDERABLE* Simple, interactive and user-defined manipulations* Helpful and specific tutorialsKEYWORDS: Protect, protector, guard, phone, defender, easy, locate, locator, find, privacy, alert, alarm, lock, restrict, authority, phone, trace, remote, lost, secret, secrecy, trust, trustworthy, insure, Where's My Droid, PhoneLocator, Lookout, Security & Antivirus, Lost Phone, Android Lost, SMS GPS Enabler, Track My Droid, ByteMe Phone Spy Lite.

reviews.title: Do NOT install this app!
reviews.comment: Installed the app after many issues with it telling me i had wrong password etc. Once installed, did not work, could not locate my phone saying GPS needed to be activated when it IS activated.  I decided to try to uninstall to try again and guess what...it won\'t let you until you log out.  Guess what, it won\'t let you log out!  I am DONE with this app as soon add i can figure out how to get rid of it!
reviews.author: Drew Grunwald

reviews.title: Poor performance. unusable
reviews.comment: I made numerous attempts to create an account. App says email already exists.  Infinite do loop. App says my gmail address won\'t work. I try to retrieve my password, app says email is wrong.
reviews.author: Ray Traynor

reviews.title: uninstalling this app
reviews.comment: hey guys, had the same problem as all of you. after lots of reading, i found a way to delete the app.  this is how you do it (galaxy s3):  1) settings 2) security 3) device administrators - un-check the app 4) delete as normal (through app manager)  hopes this helps!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Do not install
reviews.comment: My phone keeps crashing. It keeps sending messages to my emergency contact saying my phones SIM has been swapped out. Now it\'s saying my email and password is wrong. Wish I never downloaded it
reviews.author: Nykkia Dent-Noble

reviews.title: Worst App Ever
reviews.comment: It says my password doesnt match, not even my email, and it keeps sendind SMS to my friends, WORST APP EVER. To uninstall: 1 . Go setting 2.Security 3.Device administrators 4.Uncheck the app.
reviews.author: Santiago Dominguez

reviews.title: Totally Crap
